channel.title: Hiring on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hiring on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: The PrestaCrew is hiring more sailors
item.description: The team at PrestaShop is busy preparing what’s ahead for our e-commerce boat and community. There’s a lot coming and we’re looking for some extra hands to come aboard. So, what’s this all about?
